Title: Komachi to Dangorou
Description: ["Niigata city's publicity mascot characters, Komachi Hanano and Dangorou Sasa, search for the mysterious stone that was stolen after it had fallen from the skies."]
Staff: [['Maruyama, Masao', 'Producer'], ['Abe, Hisashi', 'Director, Character Design'], ['Ishida, Yoko', 'Theme Song Lyrics, Theme Song Performance']]
